treatment.taxon_hierarchy: family Asteraceae;tribe Cichorieae;genus Malacothrix;species foliosa;subspecies foliosa;
treatment.description: Stems usually 1, usually erect, branched distally. Distal cauline leaves ovate to lanceolate, pinnately lobed (at bases, lobes 1–2 pairs, narrow). Calyculi of 8–12+, lance-deltate to lanceolate bractlets. Involucres 7–11 × 3–8 mm. Phyllaries 18–22+ in 3 series. Corollas light yellow, 10–17 mm; outer ligules exserted 6–10 mm. Cypselae ± cylindro-fusiform, 0.9–1.5 mm, ribs ± equal. 2n = 14.

habitat_info.text: open sandy areas , dunes , between shrubs in chaparral ;

treatment.discussion: Subspecies foliosa is known only from San Clemente Island.
